t: Heartberry Soda, Canada’s first Indigenous soda brand, is launching in June
s: May 23, 2024 - Heartberry Soda, inspired by Indigenous knowledge and the bountiful abundance of nature in this province, claims the title of Canada’s first Indigenous soda brand.
